hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "If somebody innovates something which is not in harmony with the principles of our religion, that thing is rejected

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا اصْطَلَحُوا عَلَى صُلْحِ جَوْرٍ فَالصُّلْحُ مَرْدُودٌ
chapter.eng-name: If some people are (re)conciled on illegal basis, their reconciliation is rejected
